what-it-does: Checks for duplicate field definitions in classes.
why-is-this-bad:
Defining a field multiple times in a class body is redundant and likely a
mistake.
example:
class Person:
    name = Tom
    ...
    name = Ben



Use instead:


class Person:
    name = Tom
    ...

example-split.example-before:
class Person:
    name = Tom
    ...
    name = Ben
